title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7202.14 - Accounting of disclosures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7202.14 - Accounting of disclosures

State Regulations
(a) The
commission shall keep an accounting of all disclosures made pursuant to
paragraphs (d), (i) and (l) of subdivision 1 of section
96
of the

Public Officers Law. (b) Such
accounting shall be retained as part of the record disclosed for five years
after disclosure of the record or the life of the record disclosed, whichever
is longer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7202.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
